attributes.action: overturn the recent Law Lords ruling which denies the right of the Chagos Islanders to return to their homelands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Chagos Islanders were evicted by the British Government in the 1970s and recently lost a court battle to return to their ancestral homeland in the Indian Ocean.

In light of the Law Lords ruling being a 3-2 majority, the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to overturn this ruling and allow these people to return home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
